channel.title: ## Owner BlaBlaBla Is Online! ##
channel.description:
Ok, look at the title, how do I make an NPC constantly say that?
So people know wether I'm online or offline. Please someone help .. greatly appreciated :)[br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 06:32:44 PM[/size][hr]Please someone help. How do you make an NPC say wether you're offline or online.?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2007, 06:40:14 PM[/size][hr]OMG Can no1 please help me :(:(:(:(:(

item.title: ## Owner BlaBlaBla Is Online! ##
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

go to npchandler.java.

than find “moo”

you should see this: if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }

after the last } press enter and put this code in

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC'S ID) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("PUTNAMEHERE")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "PUTNAMEHERE is online"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "PUTNAMEHERE is offline"; }

make sure to change all of the places where it says PUT NAME HERE\and to put the npc’s id where it says NPC’SID

Read full topic

item.title: ## Owner BlaBlaBla Is Online! ##
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

I’m waiting for this thread to be locked, it’s FULL of flaming.
Steviie I’m guessing needs the help.(can’t really decide in this thread)

Here’s what you do:
You know it’s in the npchandler, so download a server you KNOW has the cheerleader saying that, and go into that file and search ‘Offline’ and add that, about in the same place, as your npchandler.

zoltanman, I just told him/her HOW to figure it out
You beat me to my point though…
(you posted first)

Read full topic

item.title: ## Owner BlaBlaBla Is Online! ##
item.dc:creator: @Super_Novex Super Novex
item.description:
@Super_Novex wrote:

you post it in the section where you see codes for making npc’s say things such as… almost every server has a santa saying “ho ho ho, holiday items” or something like that. If you know your sever has a santa saying that, search “holiday” in that file.

You can put the code there then. But I don’t think it really matters. Just to make sure.

Read full topic

item.title: ## Owner BlaBlaBla Is Online! ##
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

				}		 else if (npcs[i].npcType == NpcId)
					{
						if (misc.random2(10) <= 3)
						{
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Name"))
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "Name is online";
							}
							else
							{
								npcs[i].textUpdate = "Name is offline";
							}
